com.portletguru.portlettester

Class DefaultPreferencesConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.portletguru.portlettester.DefaultPreferencesConfig

  • public class DefaultPreferencesConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    This class stands for the default preferences settings defined in the portlet.xml file in the <portlet-preferences> tag. It also allows you to specify the javax.portlet.PreferencesValidator.

    • Method Detail

      • addPreference

        public void addPreference(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String[] values,
                 boolean isReadOnly)
        Add a default preferences item to this config.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the preference item
        values - the values of the preference item
        isReadOnly - if the preference item is read-only

      • getDefaultPreferences

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,com.portletguru.portlettester.mocks.Preference> getDefaultPreferences()
        Returns all preference items added to this config.
        Returns:
        a map whose key is the name of preference and whose value is the Preference instance that represents the preference item.

      • setValidator

        public void setValidator(PreferencesValidator validator)
        Specifies the validator of all preference items. It should be the validator ususally specified in the <preferences-validator> tag.
        Parameters:
        validator -

      • getValidator

        public PreferencesValidator getValidator()
        Returns the validator specified for this config.
        Returns:
        a javax.portlet.PreferencesValidator object
